meanings.definition: A formal suit for men, consisting of a black jacket with silk lapels, black trousers, a white shirt, and a black bow tie.
meanings.sent1: At the wedding, all the groomsmen wore matching tuxedos.
meanings.sent2: He looked elegant in his tuxedos at the gala event.
meanings.sent3: The penguins joked that they needed tuxedos for their fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent4: The night sky was adorned with stars, each one dressed in tiny tuxedos.
meanings.sent5: The tuxedos stood out in the crowd, a sea of formal attire.

meanings.definition: A formal outfit worn by men for special occasions.
meanings.sent1: The celebrities arrived at the award show in designer tuxedos.
meanings.sent2: His tuxedos always made him feel confident and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The penguin colony decided to have a tuxedos-only party on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline sparkled with lights, each building dressed in tuxedos of glass and steel.
meanings.sent5: The tuxedos added a touch of sophistication to the event, making everyone feel important.
